unnormalised: The solar rooftop subsidies are a welcome initiative, especially for cities like Chennai. It can help reduce our dependence on thermal power from Neyveli. The process should be streamlined further though. Currently, availing the Rs. subsidy requires significant paperwork, taking weeks. Perhaps a portal like Aadhaar could help? Transparency and faster disbursal (within 30 days from application on 26/01/2024) are crucial for wider adoption by households like the Sharmas in our neighbourhood. Further clarifications are needed regarding the subsidy post-installation (scheduled at 14:00 hrs on 10/02/2024) versus upfront models. And the scheme should extend beyond 31/03/2024.
